EmailTemplate.description: Used to remind users to submit Annual Survey
EmailTemplate.name: Currency Center Annual Survey Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Annual Survey reminder
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Currency Center users,
This serves as a reminder to complete your Annual Survey on the Remittance of Foreign Balance for the year {!YEAR(TODAY())-1}. Please ensure you provide us with complete information by latest 15th March {!YEAR(TODAY())}.
Should you have any queries, please log a case in your IATA Customer portal under the topic "Currency Center" Kind regards, Currency Center Team
